name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-teams-tabs-graph
title: MS Teams Channels and Tabs from Modern Team site
shortDescription: A SPFx Web Part using Graph api. It shows Channels and Tabs (with link) from a Modern Team Site connected to Microsoft Teams.
longDescription: A SPFx Web Part using @pnp/graph/teams. It shows Channels and Tabs (with link) from a Modern Team Site connected to Microsoft Teams.

thumbnails.alt: MS Teams Channels and Tabs from Modern Team site
MS Teams Channels and Tabs from Modern Team site

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
